creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension:
40 3/16 x 13 3/4 in. (102 x 35 cm) (image)
71 5/8 x 18 11/16 in. (182 x 47.5 cm) (mount) 53 cm w w/rollers
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper
text: The two girls are kamuro, young attendants of a high-class courtesan. They are trainees and will ultimately become courtesans themselves, and that debut was always an important event in the pleasure quarters. In the back is a kadomatsu, literally gate pine, a traditional New Year's decoration made of pine, bamboo, and flowering plum tree sprigs.
title: Courtesan with Two Kamuro
